description:
Two tops fuck each other!
Up until now, both Landon and Tommy have only wanted to fuck. Whenever I've brought up the subject of GETTING fucked, the response has usually been "Oh, I don't think I can do that..."
Somehow (I'm not not sure how) they managed to find each other online. They'd been talking ("tweeting and f-booking" as they said) and they decided they wanted to ask if they could do a film together. And, they volunteered to take turns fucking each other.
Well, I haven't have a request framed quite like that before, but how could I refuse?
Once they both got into town, they clicked like old friends. Apparently, they had been hanging out in the hotel watching porn together!
When they got in front of the cameras, the real fun started. Both of them are total exhibitionists and they really got into the whole situation.
First Tommy fucked Landon. Tommy said Landon was really, really tight at first, but loosened up quickly. Landon really seemed to love it.
Then it was Tommy's turn to get plowed by Landon's huge dick!
title: Landon & Tommy
